posts.post_content:
I will have to find a scan of the Green Cobb.  All are centered.  

8k for the green. 
3500 bat on. 
3000 bat off.

Cards are sold.
nice cards, im sure you wish you could just keep them considering they are so nice.

Yes I would prefer to keep every card I've owned, but there's only so much room in my collecting budget and I have my eye on something else.  These are very nice cards for the grade though and will make a nice addition for someone looking for a low to mid grade Cobb.

[quote name="pokerplyr80" post=1595894]Yes I would prefer to keep every card I've owned, but there's only so much room in my collecting budget and I have my eye on something else.  These are very nice cards for the grade though and will make a nice addition for someone looking for a low to mid grade Cobb.[/QUOTE]

Jesse, beautiful card here. Something I am in the market for, but not fits my budget. I am now on the hunt for a nice PSA version, but perhaps in a lower grade it seems.  Yours is exceptional indeed
I've had a couple of requests for better scans.  Finally bought a scanner today.  Here is the Cobb bat off front and back.

[quote name="pokerplyr80" post=1596565]green cobb[/QUOTE]

man i recognized this cobb from the ebay sale yesterday.. i always remember good looking cobbs and funny they are the same..
Yea I do regret letting that one go.  But the decision made sense at the time I made it.

[quote name="pokerplyr80" post=1947571]Yea I do regret letting that one go.  But the decision made sense at the time I made it.[/QUOTE]

thats true with most decisions...and you did end up picking another one up...
